name: Dating simulator sleeping coffin (BETA) 2.0
description:
This game is only a beta test. 

The creator of sleeping coffin and the 8Th world project present its new test game.

If you start playing this game you'll meet a horri... ops! I mean... Lots of secret Easter eggs and an amazing original story from the sleeping coffin universe. Gotta date them all and have a fun time.

But watch out from grandma skeleton thing!!!!!!!

The beta is bigger than it looks.
